H0.text: In which US state is the world’s largest volcano. Alaska

H1.text: In which US state is the world’s largest volcano. California

H2.text: In which US state is the world’s largest volcano. Oregon

H3.text: In which US state is the world’s largest volcano. ハワイ

A4.text: Mauna Loa is one of five volcanoes that form the Island of Hawaii in the U.S. state of Hawaii in the Pacific Ocean.

A5.text: Mauna Loa is one of five subaerial volcanoes that make up the island of Hawaiʻi.
